title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.2 - Contracts
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 383.2 - Contracts

State Regulations

The office must contract with a supplier for the
necessary equipment, services and supplies to implement this requirement. When
a recipient claims that his or her payment access card, which is required to
access benefits through electronic issuance systems, has been lost, stolen or
destroyed, or that the security features of the card have been compromised, the
social services district must provide the recipient with a replacement payment
access card within 48 hours, exclusive of holidays and weekends, once the
recipient has complied with the social services district's identification
verification requirements. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
383.2

Amended

New

York State Register June 9, 2021/Volume XLIII, Issue 23, eff. 6/9/2021

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
